ProductInfo.Features:
4 CH H.264 compression triplex real time CIF/HD1/D1 picture resolution industrial DVR
Two USB interface, one for data backup, one for mouse operation
Support daylight saving time, PIP and EZOOM function, live video, parameter setting and copy playback video via network
4 of Color CCD DSP CCTV 3.6mm Lens 420TVL color dome security camera
Package included: Digital Video Recorder, DVR Remote Control, DVR Power Supply, User Manual and Software CD, USB Mouse, 1.5TB Hard Drive. 4 Pack 50 Feet Security Camera Wire. 4 Color CCD Dome Cameras. 4 Channel Camera Power Supply
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu CCTV 4 Channel Video Audio H.264 Network Security Surveillance DVR Camera System, including Stand Alone Real Time Digital Video Recorder with 1500GB 3.5" SATA HDD, 4 Color CCD Wide View Angle Mini-Dome Security Cameras, 4 Pack Video Cables, 1 of 4 channel Power Supply 1BH
